alert.note: Alert for Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 25 at 2:38PM PDT until July 25 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Diego has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Riverside County in southern California... * Until 500 PM PDT. * At 238 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area with some areas having received over one inch of rain. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Southeastern Palm Springs, eastern Anza, Cathedral City, Palm Desert, Rancho Mirage, Hwy 74 Between Anza And Palm Desert, Hwy 74 Between Mountain Center And Anza, Mountain Center, Santa Rosa Mountain and Lake Hemet. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
